pr_title: [2.19.x] DDF-UI-131 allow for customization of how 2D map pans to results

timeline.message: DDF-UI-131 allow for customization of how 2D map pans to results

timeline.bodyText: ✏️ Could you add a comment that we're invoking the function with null as the extension since this is different from how most (all?) other plugins do it?
timeline.author: leo-sakh
